tips.title: Pro Tips
tips.tip1: For best results, provide text with at least 100 words for meaningful summarization.
tips.tip2: Use the "Medium" length setting for balanced summaries that capture key details.
tips.tip3: Upload TXT files directly instead of copying and pasting large documents.
tips.tip4: Your summary history is saved locally and persists between sessions.

privacy.message: Your data is processed securely and not stored on our servers
